name: nytimes
text: Homeland Security officials used planes, helicopters and drones to record recent Black Lives Matter protests in 15 American cities. They logged at least 270 hours of surveillance — far more than previously known. https://t.co/lOH0jnYZ8V

text: The coronavirus pandemic has entered "a new and dangerous phase," the WHO warned on Friday, as cases spiked across the American South and West, particularly in states that loosened restrictions on businesses several weeks ago https://t.co/n11V0PeiBA

text: Johnson & Johnson said it would stop selling skin-lightening creams in Asia and the Middle East. The decision comes after growing pressure on cosmetics makers to end marketing that suggests fair or white skin is better than darker tones. https://t.co/ZXavQybczL

name: nytimes
text: Brazil passed 1 million coronavirus cases on Friday, and at least 3 U.S. states saw record spikes as the WHO warned of a new, “dangerous” phase. Follow updates on the pandemic: https://t.co/gtb8P0Pqy7

name: nytimes
text:
Breaking News: The U.S. attorney in Manhattan, whom the attorney general just tried to fire, is refusing to leave. The clash sets up a crisis in the Justice Dept.
https://t.co/JrVoUMNZfR

name: nytimes
text: The Justice Department on Friday tried to oust the U.S. attorney in Manhattan, Geoffrey S. Berman, the powerful federal prosecutor whose has investigated President Trump’s associates. But Berman said in a statement that he won't leave his post.  https://t.co/YX8iQN0MeP

name: nytimes
text: Illegal fireworks can be heard all night long in many neighborhoods in New York, an already-jittery city that has been transformed by the coronavirus pandemic and widespread protests. Complaints have surged, with more than 1,700 in the first half of June. https://t.co/hKulDN3fnb

text:

The past several weeks, as protests over the killing of George Floyd rippled through U.S. cities, have left veterans of the civil rights era with trepidation and hope. https://t.co/ZYWgJLBZ8P

text: Just 6 companies make Stilton, a famous crumbly, British blue cheese. The coronavirus pandemic has pushed some of them close to the edge. https://t.co/6utgDgi3aE
